sent: The Fifth Republic, France's current republican system of government, was established by Charles de Gaulle under the Constitution of the Fifth Republic on 4 October 1958.

sub_label: Progressive Conservative Association of Nova Scotia
sent: Like most conservative parties in Atlantic Canada, Progressive Conservative Association of Nova Scotia have been historically associated with the "Red Tory" faction within Canadian conservatism.
